T02D3439:98b-1: mukta ke na sthi ra tsakra s'a dha nam /
T02D3439:98b-3: tshig lhug pa'i brtan pa'i 'khor lo'i sgrub thabs /
T02D3439:98b-5: dpal ldan 'jam dpal rdo rje ste //
T02D3439:98b-6: skyob pa de la phyag 'tshal nas //
T02D3439:98b-7: byis pa rnams kyis rtogs bya'i phyir //
T02D3439:98b-9: rnal 'byor pa stan bde ba la nye bar 'dug ste /
T02D3439:98b-12: byang chub sems dpa' rnams nam mkha' la bzhugs par bsam ste /
T02D3439:98b-13: de rnams la yid kyi rang bzhin las byung ba'i
T02D3439:98b-14: rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i mchod pa byas nas sdig
T02D3439:98b-15: pa bshags pa la sogs pa bya'o //
T02D3439:98b-16: de nas sna tshogs pa'i gzung ba dang 'dzin pa
T02D3439:98b-17: sems tsam zhes spang bar byas nas rmi lam dang
T02D3439:98b-18: gzugs brnyan lta bur bdag nyid kyis nges par byas
T02D3439:98b-19: te / gur gum lta bur dmar ba'i mu:yig las
T02D3439:98b-20: skyes pa'i zla ba'i 'od zer dmar po las aa
T02D3439:98b-21: la sogs pa'i dbyangs yig 'bar ba blta bar bya'o
T02D3439:99a-1: de'i steng du mu:yig las skyes pa'i 'od zer dmar
T02D3439:99a-2: po can gyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la 'bar ba'i
T02D3439:99a-3: ka yig la sogs pa blta bar bya'o //
T02D3439:99a-4: de'i steng du mu:yig las skyes pa 'phro zhing dri
T02D3439:99a-5: ma med pa'i autpal de'i ze'u 'bru la mu:yig gis
T02D3439:99a-7: de yongs su gyur pa las gur gum lta bu'i
T02D3439:99a-8: gzhon nu zur phud lnga pa rgyan dang bcas shing
T02D3439:99a-9: / sgeg pa'i nyams dang ldan pa /
T02D3439:99a-10: ral gri dang po ti bsnams pa'i ngag gi dbang
T02D3439:99a-11: phyug zla ba'i gdan la bdag nyid bsgom par bya'o
T02D3439:99a-12: // de'i thugs kar mu:yig las skyes pa'i brtan pa'i
T02D3439:99a-13: 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad po 'od kyis rang bzhin can
T02D3439:99a-14: la 'bar ba'i aa la sogs pas bskor ba /
T02D3439:99a-15: phyi rol du 'bar ba'i ka la sogs pa'i phreng bas bskor ba ste /
T02D3439:99a-16: de'i lte ba la aa yig go //
T02D3439:99a-17: shar gyi rtsibs la ra yig go //
T02D3439:99a-18: lho'i rtsibs la pa yig go //
T02D3439:99a-19: nub kyi rtsibs la tsa yig go //
T02D3439:99a-20: byang gi rtsibs la na yig go //
T02D3439:99a-21: me la sogs pa'i mtshams rnams la yang ni //
T02D3439:99a-22: pra:panytsa zhes pa'i yi ge rnams gur gum lta bu'i rnam par bsams la /
T02D3439:99a-23: 'khor lo de'i 'od kyi tshogs kyis lus kyi nang gsal bar byas nas /
T02D3439:99a-24: ba spu so so'i khung nas phyir byung ste /
T02D3439:99a-25: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gsal bar byas nas
T02D3439:99a-26: slar yang de bzhin du de rnams ba spu'i khung
T02D3439:99a-27: bur phyi nas rab tu zhugs te lus kyi nang
T02D3439:99a-28: gsal bar byed par yun ring du rnam par bsam
T02D3439:99a-29: par bya ste / aom aa ra pa tsa na mu:zhes pa ni bzlas pa'i sngags so //
T02D3439:99a-30: brtan pa'i 'khor lo'i sgrub pa'i thabs //
T02D3439:99a-31: byas pa'i bsod nams gang bsags pa //
T02D3439:99a-32: de yis 'gro ba thams cad ni //
